item.description:
As a real estate investor there can be numerous things standing our way of making a profit. One of which is property damage caused from water, fire, or mold. Whether you are a landlord, house flipper, or financer you should have some basic understanding of how to effectively deal with these unforeseen circumstances. The more prepared you are, the more money you can keep in your pocket. Are you prepared?

 

Main Points of Discussion:

Common sources of property fire/water damage and how to avoid

What to do in the event of property damage emergency

Got Mold? Now what?

 

SPEAKER BIO:

Name: Joshua Solloway

Hometown: Manchester, NH

Company: Soil-Away Cleaning & Restoration, Hooksett, NH

Services: Fire and Water damage mitigation, Mold remediation, Bio-Hazard clean up

History: Founded in 1990 by Jack Solloway (father) in Haverhill, MA

Title: Director of Client Services (2.5 years)

Industry Certifications: 5 different IICRC certifications; Journeyman Fire & Smoke Restorer, Journeyman Textile Cleaner

Education: 2007- B.A. Sport & Exercise Science from Messiah College; Expected graduation 2013- M.B.A Southern New Hampshire University

Wife: Kaitlin

Favorite movie: Die Hard (the original)

Hobby: Reading and running

Favorite Quote: “Early to bed, early to rise, makes a man, healthy, wealthy, and wise”

 

 

The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door


Ask about getting YOUR membership today!

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Avoiding, Preparing & Dealing with Property Damage
